# NSToolbarItemGroup.SelectionMode.selectAny

**Case**

The system toggles a highlight on any item selected.

## Declaration

```swift
case selectAny
```

## Selection modes

- **NSToolbarItemGroup.SelectionMode.momentary**: The system temporarily highlights the select group item when the user selects the item.
- **NSToolbarItemGroup.SelectionMode.selectOne**: The system displays a highlighted mode on the most recent item selected.
